DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : CHINA
DOC.TEXT: Automotive Blueprint Published : The government unveiled its plan for developing an automotive industry that can satisfy demand for car ownership by the country ' s 300 million families , targeting a 90 % market share for Chinese-based plants by the end of the century . The long-awaited Automotive Industry Policy , approved by Premier Li Peng in March and published in the People ' s Daily last week , calls_for removal of obstacles to private car ownership and introduces measures severely limiting foreign access to the huge market . The policy restricts car imports to six ports_of_entry and rules that the number and type of foreign cars bought must be approved by the State Council , China ' s Cabinet .
